nodes.title: Classical Uncertainty
nodes.excerpt: Model error, discretization, and boundary-condition uncertainty.
nodes.bodyMD:
Classical uncertainty stems from model assumptions, boundary conditions, and discretization error (docs/knowledge/physics/boundary-conditions-modes.md, docs/knowledge/physics/discretization-mesh.md, docs/knowledge/physics/numerical-precision.md).

Minimal artifact: error budget + boundary-condition justification.
nodes.summary: Model error, discretization, and boundary-condition uncertainty.

nodes.bodyMD:

Minimal artifact: sampling distribution + propagated band.

nodes.title: Quantum-Stochastic Bridge
nodes.excerpt: Noise-kernel and coherence-window constraints for semiclassical sourcing.
nodes.bodyMD:
Quantum-stochastic uncertainty uses <T_{mu nu}>_ren with noise models and coherence windows (docs/quantum-gr-bridge.md). Collapse bounds inform tau/r_c choices (docs/DP_COLLAPSE_DERIVATION.md, shared/dp-collapse.ts).

Minimal artifact: stochastic source contract + tau/r_c bounds.
nodes.summary: Noise-kernel and coherence-window constraints for semiclassical sourcing.

nodes.title: Transient Energy Approximations
nodes.excerpt: Approximation ladders and energy bands bridging classical and statistical models.
nodes.bodyMD:
Transient energy approximations bridge classical estimates and statistical bands (server/energy-pipeline.ts axisymmetric + Monte Carlo surface-area bands; modules/sim_core/static-casimir.ts PFA/geometry approximations; docs/casimir-tile-mechanism.md model bands).

Minimal artifact: approximation ladder + band justification.
nodes.summary: Approximation ladders and energy bands bridging classical and statistical models.

nodes.title: Collapse Framework Constraints
nodes.excerpt: Causal collapse benchmarks and policy gating.
nodes.bodyMD:
Collapse benchmarks treat commit/selection as a causally bounded event with tau and r_c (docs/collapse-benchmark-backend-roadmap.md, shared/collapse-benchmark.ts) and inform policy via the coherence governor (modules/policies/coherence-governor.ts).

Minimal artifact: collapse benchmark run + causal footprint report.
nodes.summary: Causal collapse benchmarks and policy gating.

Minimal artifact: constraint checklist.
nodes.summary: Energy conditions, quantum inequality limits, and sampling bounds.
